data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part VII. Glabriconnus, a new subgenus of Euconnus from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Jałoszyński, Paweł (2016): Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part VII. Glabriconnus, a new subgenus of Euconnus from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4084 (4), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.4.7
